CARD.TITLE: Welcome to the Translation Demo
CARD.WELCOME: This is a demonstration of Angular's internationalization capabilities.
CARD.DESCRIPTION: Switch between English and French using the buttons in the header. All text on this card will be translated according to the selected language.
CARD.INFO_ITEM1: Simple language switching between English and French
CARD.INFO_ITEM2: Translations are loaded from separate JSON files
CARD.INFO_ITEM3: Uses Angular's translate pipe for seamless text replacement
